targets.expr:
sum by (vendor, finality) (
  erpc_upstream_request_total{
    network=~"$network",
    project=~"$project",
    client_name=~"$client_name",
    cluster_key=~"$cluster_key",
    vendor=~"$vendor",
    category=~"$category",
    finality=~"${finality:regex}"
  }
)

panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method
panels.title: Incoming Requests

panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method
panels.title: Incoming RPS

panels.description: Total successful responses sent back to the client
panels.title: Successful Responses

panels.description: When a request fails even after trying all upstreams and retries, we send a error response to the user. This chart shows critical errors that need attention and wake-up alarms.
panels.title: Network-level Critical Errors

panels.description: Issues where clients got an error but it's most probably due to bad requests or a transient problem with upstreams
panels.title: Network-level Warnings

panels.description: Client-side errors where it's most probably a normal operation (eth_call reverts) or bad request by the user
panels.title: Network-level Notices

panels.description: When identical requests arrive at the same time they'll be merged, this number shows number of these requests
panels.title: Multiplexed requests

panels.description: Total hedge requests fired due to initial upstream being slow
panels.title: Hedge RPS

panels.description: Total hedged requests that ended up being actually faster and useful. The higher the better. If this value is too low try increasing the failsafe.hedge.quantile to higher value e.g. 0.99

targets.expr: 1 - ((sum(increase(erpc_network_hedge_discards_total{attempt!="1",network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}",finality=~"${finality:regex}"}[30s])) by (project, network, upstream)) / (sum(increase(erpc_network_hedged_request_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}",finality=~"${finality:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, upstream))) > 0

panels.title: Hedge Effectiveness

panels.description: Shows the finality state of the block related to the response, this shows if your workload is mainly around head of chain unfinalized data, or historical finalized data.
panels.title: Response Finality Share

panels.description: Highest value for latest block polled from all upstreams across all replicas
panels.title: Highest Finalized Block

panels.description: Highest value for latest block polled from all upstreams across all replicas
panels.title: Highest Latest Block

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries, grouped by Vendor Name
panels.title: Vendor Requests

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Vendor RPS

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures

names: main, evm:10143, eth_getLogs, erpc-global-cache, ErrEndpointServerSideException - -32603 - ErrJsonRpcExceptionInternal gRPC call failed rpc error code Canceled desc context canceled

panels.title: Upstream-level critical errors

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_upstream_request_errors_total{severity="warning",network=~"${network:regex}",vendor=~"${vendor:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",composite="none",project=~"${project:regex}",finality=~"${finality:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, vendor, category, finality, error) > 0

panels.title: Vendor warnings

panels.description: Dynamically tuned value for maxCount of different rate limit budgets. NOTE This value is SUM of all replicas (in a multiple container setup)
panels.title: Rate-limit budget MaxCount

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Upstream-level Requests

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Upstream-level RPS

panels.description: Total requests that are sent to upstream but is rate-limited by the provider node
panels.title: Upstream-level Remote rate-limited Requests

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures
panels.title: Upstream-level critical errors

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures
panels.title: Upstream-level warnings

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures
panels.title: Upstream-level notices

panels.description: Total number of times a request was skipped due to upstream latest block being less than requested upper bound block
panels.title: Upstream stale upper-bound

panels.description: Total number of times a request was skipped due to requested lower bound block being less than upstream's available block range.
panels.title: Upstream stale lower-bound

panels.description: A special lagging tracker showing only lags of above 5000 blocks which indicates node too far off.
panels.title: Out-of-sync latest block lag by Upstream

panels.description: How many times we had to Poll for latest block number. This number can go up by integrity module if debounce config is too low.
panels.title: Latest Block Polls

panels.description: Difference between lowest and highest finalized block as reported by upstreams. Min/Max/Mean are values across multiple replicas (if you have erpc in a multi-container setup)
panels.title: Finalized Block Lag by Upstream

panels.description: A special lagging tracker showing only lags of above 5000 blocks which indicates node too far off.
panels.title: Out-of-sync Finalized Blocks by Upstream

panels.description: How many times we had to Poll for finalized block number.
panels.title: Finalized Block Polls

panels.description: How many times upstream returned a stale latest block (compared to other nodes) for eth_getBlockByNumber(latest) and eth_blockNumber
panels.title: Stale latest block by Upstream

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

panels.description: How many times upstream returned stale finalized block (compared to other nodes) for eth_getBlockByNumber(finalized) and eth_blockNumber
panels.title: Stale finalized block by Upstream

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

sum(increase(erpc_cache_set_success_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_success_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_set_success_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

sum(increase(erpc_cache_set_error_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, error, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))

sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (cluster_name, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",error!="ErrRecordNotFound: record not found",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl, error))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_error_duration_seconds_bucket{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",error!="ErrRecordNotFound: record not found",project=~"${project:regex}"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl, error))

sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)

sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_error_total{network=~"${network:regex}",upstream=~"${upstream:regex}",category=~"${category:regex}",error!="ErrRecordNotFound: record not found",project=~"${project:regex}"}[1m])) by (project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl, error)

panels.description: These are issues that are most often edge-cases that are not covered within eRPC logic, and must be reported to the team.
panels.title: Unexpected panics

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_shadow_response_mismatch_total{project=~"${project:regexp}",network=~"${network:regexp}"}[1m])) by (project, network, upstream, category, emptyish, larger)
